snippet: A $75 million mixed-use project is at the heart of a long-sought upgrading of the Bayview, a declining neighborhood.
abstract: Bayview neighborhood in San Francisco, Calif, is expected to get a boost from a $75 million mixed-use project; neighborhood's decline was hastened by the decommissioning of a naval shipyard along the city's southeastern waterfront in the 1970s; despite numerous attempts to revive the area, Bayview has remained plagued by abandoned warehouses and abandoned railroad tracks.
lead_paragraph: A $75 million mixed-use project is at the heart of a long-sought upgrading of the Bayview, a declining neighborhood.

headline.seo: Revived Project Lifts Bayview, a Blighted San Francisco Area
headline.main: A San Francisco District Begins to Reduce Blight
headline.print_headline: A San Francisco District Begins to Reduce Blight
